    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Chance The Rapper Releases New Mixtape 'Coloring Book']]></title>
      <description>Chance the Rapper released his new mixtape, Coloring Book, on Thursday. It includes the "No Problem" track he released earlier on the day he dropped his third mixtape, which features Lil Wayne and 2 Chainz, and it also houses his previously shared "Blessings" and "Angels."

The mixtape boasts a bevy of collaborators including...</description>
      <content:encoded><![CDATA[Chance the Rapper released his new mixtape, Coloring Book, on Thursday. It includes the "No Problem" track he released earlier on the day he dropped his third mixtape, which features Lil Wayne and 2 Chainz, and it also houses his previously shared "Blessings" and "Angels."

The mixtape boasts a bevy of collaborators including...]]></content:encoded>
      <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 00:18:00 -0400</pubDate>

      <title><![CDATA[Hear Alessia Cara, G-Eazy's  Confident 'Wild Things (Remix)']]></title>
      <description>Alessia Cara has released a remix to "Wild Things" featuring G-Eazy. The original song hails from her November debut album, Know-it-All. 

On the Maurice Sendak-inspired track, the Canadian singer-songwriter confidently sings that she won't "hang around the in-crowd/The cool kids aren't cool to me." On the chorus she declares, "Find me where the...</description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Hear Chvrches' Soaring Song 'Warning Call']]></title>
      <description>Glaswegian synth-pop band Chvrches have released their soaring "Warning Call." The original song serves as the video soundtrack for Mirror's Edge Catalyst.

The video game involves first person action and focuses on main character "Faith's origin story as she fights for freedom within the city of glass," as described in the YouTube post.
Trio...</description>

      <title><![CDATA[Keith Richards: 'I'd Work With Bob Dylan in Hell or Heaven']]></title>
      <description>The Rolling Stones will soon be gearing up for their Desert Trip festival, which will find them at Indio, California's Empire Polo Club for two weekends in October, alongside their music veteran peers Paul McCartney, Bob Dylan, the Who, Neil Young and Roger Waters. In an interview with Q104.3, the Stones' Mick Jagger and Keith Richards talked about the...</description>

In an interview with Q104.3, the Stones' Mick Jagger and Keith Richards talked about the...]]></content:encoded>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA['Nashville' Cancelled After Four Seasons]]></title>
      <description>ABC's Nashville has officially been cancelled. As Variety reports, the country music-themed show, which is in the midst of its fourth season, will end its run this month. 

The nighttime soap-styled drama stars Connie Britton, Hayden Panettiere, Clare Bowen, Chris Carmack, Will Chase, Charles Esten, Jonathan Jackson, Sam Palladio, Aubrey Peeples, Lennon Stella and...</description>

      <description>2 Chainz challenges Donald Trump's anti-Muslim rhetoric in the black-and-white clip for single "100 Joints." The song is one of 2 Chainz's solo cuts on ColleGrove, a largely collaborative album he made with Lil Wayne.

      <description>Ozzy Osbourne and Slipknot's Corey Taylor announced that Ozzfest and Knotfest would be joining forces for a standalone mega-fest this fall at a press conference Thursday.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Meet the Luthier Who Made Prince's One-of-a-Kind Guitars]]></title>
      <description>Prince's unique musicianship was mirrored and enabled by the ornate guitars he used. Luthier Andy Beech of D'haitre Guitars in Bellingham, Washington is behind many of them. Beech designed 31 instruments for the late musicians including his famous "Cloud" guitar and "Symbol" guitar. 

"I feel unbelievably privileged," Beech said while showing how the specialized instrument was constructed. "When...</description>
      <content:encoded><![CDATA[Prince's unique musicianship was mirrored and enabled by the ornate guitars he used. Luthier Andy Beech of D'haitre Guitars in Bellingham, Washington is behind many of them. Beech designed 31 instruments for the late musicians including his famous "Cloud" guitar and "Symbol" guitar. 

"I feel unbelievably privileged," Beech said while showing how the specialized instrument was constructed. "When...]]></content:encoded>

      <title><![CDATA[Donald Trump's Biggest Policy Flip-Flops]]></title>
      <description>In his 1987 book The Art of the Deal, Donald Trump wrote, "I never get too attached to one deal or one approach. ... I keep a lot of balls in the air, because most deals fall out, no matter how promising they seem at first."

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Stone Roses Return With Buoyant New Song 'All For One']]></title>
      <description>The Stone Roses released a rollicking new alt-rock song "All For One" on Thursday. It marks the British band's first original track since 1994. The single is upbeat Britpop with layered, winsome vocals recalling those on Oasis' "Champagne Supernova." 

In March, frontman Ian Brown confirmed the Stone Roses were at work on a new album after speaking with NME outside of...</description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Kris Kristofferson's 80th Birthday Celebrated With 16-Disc Box Set]]></title>
      <description>The 80th birthday of songwriter, actor and country-music icon Kris Kristofferson will be celebrated next month with the release of The Complete Monument & Columbia Album Collection, a 16-CD deluxe box set from Sony Music's Legacy Recordings. Due June 10th, the collection will consist of 11 of Kristofferson's studio albums...</description>
